title: The Complete Local SEO Guide for Service Businesses
description: Learn how to dominate local search results. A practical guide to Google Business Profile optimization, local keywords, and building regional authority.
author: Mohamed Toudghi

faqs.question: How long does it take to see results from Local SEO?
faqs.answer: Typically, you can see initial improvements in 1-3 months for technical fixes and GBP optimization. Significant authority and ranking dominance usually take 6-12 months depending on the competition.

faqs.question: Is Google Business Profile free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Google Business Profile is a free tool provided by Google. You only pay for Google Ads if you choose to run local search advertisements.

faqs.question: Do I need a website for Local SEO?
faqs.answer: While you can rank in the Local Pack with just a Google Business Profile, having a fast, mobile-optimized website significantly boosts your prominence and allows you to target more specific local keywords.
